H0.text: What kind of clouds produce a ’Mackeral Sky’. Altocumulus

H1.text: What kind of clouds produce a ’Mackeral Sky’. Stratocumulus

H2.text: What kind of clouds produce a ’Mackeral Sky’. Cirrostratus

H3.text: What kind of clouds produce a ’Mackeral Sky’. Cirrocumulus

A4.text: A mackerel sky is a term for clouds made up of rows of cirrocumulus or altocumulus clouds

A5.text: Extensive altocumulus formations, particularly if they take the form of undulatus, are often referred to as altocumulus mackerel sky.
